===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Clorinde)
:{{A|vo card clorinde freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Clorinde:''' It's quite lively in here. But this game is quite different from the ones we play at Tabletop Troupe.

:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card clorinde leave 01.ogg}} '''Clorinde:''' Leaving already? I'm going to stay a little longer and take a closer look at how these cards work. Some of the skill descriptions are quite interesting &mdash; I'd like to use them as reference for future tabletop games.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card clorinde endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Clorinde:''' I've won this round. Want to take a look at my deck? It's a fairly standard mix, but you're welcome to examine it if you're interested.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card clorinde endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Clorinde:''' Well done. Games like these are decided on skill, rather than luck. You won this fair and square, and I respect the result.
{{Dialogue End}}
